name: Drag and Defend
description:
Drag and Defend

Circles with faces have gone mad and are heading towards the orphanage! The Circles with bodies will stand against treachery and save the day. Clone, Drag and Fight your way to victory. 

How to play:

Begin by dragging your circle with a body to any point in the screen to either begin attacking or to work station. There are three work stations that provide either a new clone, increases the firing rate, or increases the power of each shot. If a single enemy circle hit the building, it is game over!

How to Win:

Get past 70 enemies to win!

Music by:  BLEO - Death Destroyer (Radio Edit) feat. Rhinostrich
